result.title: My Nintendo（マイニンテンドー）
result.description:
"My Nintendo" is a free app that makes your Nintendo gaming experience more fun, convenient, and economical.

With this app, you can check your My Nintendo Point balance, as well as records of your Nintendo Switch games, the latest information on "Kinaru" software, and software and goods from the My Nintendo Store. This app is also useful for check-ins at stores such as Nintendo's official store "Nintendo TOKYO / OSAKA / KYOTO" and various events.

Main features of “My Nintendo” app

◆ Check your My Nintendo Points balance
・You can check the balance of My Nintendo Gold/Platinum points.
・You can also check the points that will expire at the end of the month, and you will be notified by notification before the expiry date.

-You can check information on goods that can be exchanged with platinum points.
・Please check the latest merchandise information before your platinum points expire.

◆ Check your playing record
・You can check the "recent notes" that you have played or checked in on Nintendo Switch.
・You can see the past week's play records on a daily basis, including when, which software you played, and how much you played.
・You can also see the record of your check-in to the event using GPS or QR code.

-You can check the list of software you have played so far.
・You can see records of software played on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo 3DS, and Wii U until the end of February 2020. *1
・"What game software have you played the longest?" "When was the first day you played it?" If you retrace your nostalgic memories, you may discover something unexpected. You can rearrange the software you have played in various orders and choose to show/hide it.
(*1) To view Nintendo 3DS and Wii U records, you need to link your Nintendo account and Nintendo Network ID.

◆ Check the latest information on “Kinaru” software
・We will deliver various news such as Nintendo Switch game software, live events, character goods, etc.
・When you "Kinari" the news, you can check related articles and follow-up news, and check the upcoming schedule on "Home".
・You can also watch "Nintendo Direct", where Nintendo directly announces the latest information, with this app. We will also notify you of the latest broadcast schedule, so please use it to avoid missing out on live broadcasts. You can also view past archived videos from the app.

◆ Shopping at My Nintendo Store *2
・Lots of products unique to My Nintendo Store, including Nintendo Switch game software, character goods, and store-exclusive products.
-You can easily view information on various Nintendo Switch software such as "latest titles" and "sales".
・Don't miss out on bargains. If you put the item you're interested in on your My Nintendo Store's "Wish List," you'll receive a notification when it goes on sale.
(*2) You can proceed to My Nintendo Store from this app.

◆ Check-in with GPS
・Use your device's GPS function to check in at the Nintendo official store "Nintendo TOKYO / OSAKA / KYOTO" and various other events. *3
(*3) To use the GPS check-in function, you must allow the use of location information on your device. Locations and events where GPS check-in is available vary depending on the time of year.

◆Display the QR code of your Nintendo account
・You can immediately display the QR code of your Nintendo account from "My Page".
・You can also receive special benefits when purchasing products at Nintendo's official store "Nintendo TOKYO / OSAKA / KYOTO" or by presenting it at certain events.
- Event information will be announced on the app's "News" page, so don't miss it.

[For use]
・To use some features of this app, you need to log in with a Nintendo account.
・Internet communication is required to use the app. Data traffic may be required.
- To use this app, you need a device with an OS version of Android 9.0 or later installed.

QR code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE CORPORATION.
© 2020 Nintendo

result.summary: The latest information on software and events, and memories of playing all in one place
result.developerLegalAddress: 11-1, KAMITOBAHOKODATECHO, MINAMI-KU, KYOTO, 京都府 601-8116, Japan
result.recentChanges:
・使い勝手の改善を行いました。
・不具合の修正を行いました。
・Android 対応バージョンを変更しました。このアプリを使用するには、Android 9.0以降のバージョンのOSをインストールした端末が必要です。
